Description:
Prepare necessary paperwork (contracts, leases, acknowledgements etc)
Market properties effectively through a range of advertising channels, including online listings, print media, and social media platforms.
Create, organize, and maintain all necessary documentation, including contracts, leases, acknowledgements, and other forms.
Utilize intermediate-level negotiation skills during lease processes, guiding clients on market conditions, pricing, legal requirements, and other pertinent factors to guarantee transparent and equitable transactions.Skills
Skills:
Remain knowledgeable about real estate markets and best practices;
Proactive in seeking out new learning opportunities, with a natural ability to pick up new skills and knowledge quickly.
Keep abreast of real estate market developments and industry best practices;
Possess a strong desire for personal and professional growth, with a demonstrated ability to rapidly learn and apply new information.
Good Communication skills are highly required.
English, Hindi are required plus additional languages like Arabic and Russian will be desirable
Experience of real estate company is required
Driving License is required
Own visa holder is required
Competitive salary and attractive incentives will be offered if you meet above mentioned criteria
Trainings and learning sessions to promote your career
Any additional benefits will be based on your performance
